isFocusable.description: If `true` and `isDisabled`, the `Tab` will be focusable but not interactive.

defaultIndex.description: The initial index of the selected tab (in uncontrolled mode)

direction.description:
The writing mode direction.

- When in RTL, the left and right navigation is flipped

index.description: The index of the selected tab (in controlled mode)

isFitted.description: If `true`, tabs will stretch to width of the tablist.

isLazy.description:
Performance ðŸš€:
If `true`, rendering of the tab panel's will be deferred until it is selected.

isManual.description:
If `true`, the tabs will be manually activated and
display its panel by pressing Space or Enter.

If `false`, the tabs will be automatically activated
and their panel is displayed when they receive focus.

lazyBehavior.description:
Performance ðŸš€:
The lazy behavior of tab panels' content when not active.
Only works when `isLazy={true}`

- "unmount": The content of inactive tab panels are always unmounted.
- "keepMounted": The content of inactive tab panels is initially unmounted,
but stays mounted when selected.

onChange.description: Callback when the index (controlled or un-controlled) changes.

orientation.description: The orientation of the tab list.
